amendment.description: Amendment designates $10 million of economic support funds for the Community Action Program in Iraq.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to designate $10,000,000 for the Community Action Program.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Shays amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A006) offered by Mr. Shays.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Shays amendment (A006) Agreed to by voice vote.
